abstract: Letter from California Gov Jerry Brown responds to March 29 editorial accusing Republican presidential candidate Donald J Trump of using reckless language in describing his foreign policy.
lead_paragraph: Jerry Brown, the governor of California, and another reader discuss an editorial criticizing Mr. Trump.

headline.main: Donald Trump’s Comments on Foreign Affairs
headline.print_headline: Donald Trump’s Comments on Foreign Affairs

snippet: Jerry Brown, the governor of California, and another reader discuss an editorial criticizing Mr. Trump.
